about_the_game:
You awake with no memory of your past, armed with a lyre, surrounded by instrument-bearing warriors. To make matters even weirder, the tuba on your head won't stop talking to you.

Based on the Tuba Knight memes, Kicking Brass is set in the Symphonic Continent, where musicians can receive supernatural abilities via their performances. Every aspect of daily life is shaped by music: tools, clothing and weapons are replaced by instruments and those who can wield them are greatly admired.

Wield different instruments!
In a world where weapons don't exist, instruments are your only defense. From Violins to Lotus Flutes, each instrument grants you unique abilities and synergizes with other items in the game!

Fight in a musically responsive world!
Your attacks and abilities as well as those of enemies adjust depending on the soundtrack that's currently playing!

Team work makes the dream work!
The Brass Empire may mostly be grunts, but they're not your grandpa's NPCs! Enemies will arrange themselves in formations in order to balance out their weaknesses and counteract your strengths, making for a true challenge.

Meet some friendly (and not so friendly) faces!
Meet a wide variety of unique characters who will help or hinder you on your journey! Complete quests, unlock new items and shape the way the arena changes as you approach its challenges. Vendors can procure you helpful gear and Jerome the brasssmith will upgrade whatever you've gathered along your way.

name: Kicking Brass

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: There's a talking tuba stuck on your head and it won't come off! Fight your way through this third-person bullet hell boss rush, inspired by the Tuba Knight memes. Shoot notes, help characters try to escape the arena, or die trying and begin anew.
